name: node-server-skeleton
description: The starting point for a modern Node server application

scripts.post-merge: npm run check-version && npm install && npm dedupe && npm run check-security && npm outdated --long
scripts.setup: npm run post-merge && cp scripts/hooks/* .git/hooks && git config push.followTags true
scripts.test: npm run check-version && npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:unit: NODE_ENV=test babel-node node_modules/.bin/isparta cover --root src --report text --report html test/index.js -- test/unit

author: Aldwin Vlasblom <aldwin.vlasblom@gmail.com> (https://github.com/Avaq)
